findings.title: Typo in require message
findings.description: In the UniqVesting contract on line 214 there is a typo in the require message. Instead of **match** there’s **math**.

findings.title: Incorrect usage of modifier
findings.description: In the UniqVesting contract on line 185 instead of using the require statement we can simply use the modifier **onlyOwner** on line 184.

findings.title: Division by zero in balanceOf function
findings.description: In the balanceOf function of UniqVesting contract, dividing first and then multiplying can cause division by zero when pctWithdrawn is greater than 0, resulting in returning 0.

findings.title: Typo in require message
findings.description: In the UniqVesting contract on line 214 there is a typo in the require message. Instead of **match** there’s **math**.

findings.title: Uninherited abstract contracts
findings.description: Abstract contracts are never actually inherited and implemented.

findings.title: Missing events in functions
findings.description: Events are missing in certain functions of UniqVesting and UniqToken contracts.

findings.title: Typo in comments
findings.description: There are two typos in require messages: 'math' instead of 'match' on line 214 and 'Ure' instead of 'You’re' on lines 191.
